thread.title: High school kid maps out the ultimate prom date proposal
thread.title_full: High school kid maps out the ultimate prom date proposal

author: Kayla
title: High school kid maps out the ultimate prom date proposal
text:
things we do for young love. Claire Short took to Twitter to brag about her prom date running 5.5 miles as his way of asking her. He must have mapped that out really good because looking at the GPS he didn’t get lost once. 2 
He ran a pattern in order to spell out “Prom” and I’m assuming he ran all the way to her house and showed her his great achievement immediately after. Anything is possible when you’re 18 and beer isn’t your main food group yet. 
Cheers to this guy for surviving the 5.5 mile run and scoring a cute prom date! 3
